graph_title: Proportion of children aged 1–17 years who experienced any physical punishment and/or psychological aggression by caregivers in the past month
indicator_name: Proportion of children aged 1–17 years who experienced any physical punishment and/or psychological aggression by caregivers in the past month
target_name: End abuse, exploitation, trafficking and all forms of violence against and torture of children
page_content: The indicator maps the number of interfaith events in the district. The figures come from the project "Getting into action - Treptow-Köpenick interreligious" and are currently still to be understood as an approximate figure, as not all interreligious events are known to the district office.
